query.name: Instances recursively with subclasses
Topics that have no type nor super class
Topics that do not have a base name
Number of instances in topic map
Find topics that don't have a base name
Find topics with four character base names
Insert test
Select test 2
query.query: %prefix core http://wandora.org/si/core/ SELECT $test WHERE $test ISA core:content-type OR $test ISA core:association-type ORDER BY $test >> characteristics tm:name >> atomify [ 0 ]

query.name: Update variant test
query.query: # This does not work for some reason %prefix core http://wandora.org/si/core/ %prefix test http://wandora.org/si/test/ UPDATE variants ADD core:lang-independent "Test content type" WHERE test:testctype >> characteristics tm:name

query.name: Merge test
query.query: %prefix core http://wandora.org/si/core/ %prefix test http://wandora.org/si/test/ MERGE test:testctype, test:testatype
